name: Rodrigo J. Ortiz Cayón
body:
Hello folk! 
Thanks for being here. This is my personal and professional site. 

My name is Rodrigo Jose to honor my two uncles Rodrigo and Jose.
Usually I write my middle name as “J” in allusion to an episode of [_The Simpsons_](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dbw3L3Lu1R4). 

I was born in the [Colombian caribbean](https://www.google.fr/maps/@11.1286071,-74.5994455,10z). There, I lived part of my life and started my formation as Computer Engineer. I have also lived in Italy, France and Spain. Where I continued with graduate studies. 

In all this lifetime, luck has been on my side and I have met wonderful people (friends, family, professors and colleges) who helped to tackle obstacle one can face. To them a big THANK YOU.

### Disclaimer:
> I have started this site while I had to write my PhD thesis too. As this is time demanding, I would slowly add professional content as well as blogging about cooking and spearfishing. Here is a video so you have a nice day:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
